DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate role frequency setting spinal cord stimulation management Failed Back Surgery Syndrome ( SCS Frequency Study ) .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old time informed consent Willing able provide sign date informed consent Capable comprehend consent English Willing able comply study procedure , study visit , available duration study On stable dose ( new , discontinue change ) prescribe pain medication willing/able maintain decrease dose prescribe pain medication Tried appropriate conventional medical management pain Not indicate additional surgical treatment opinion refer physician spinal surgeon Undergone previous spinal surgery Diagnosed FBSS appropriate pain score Primary pain appropriate spinal level Has active implant device , whether turn Displays current sign systemic infection Pregnant lactating , inadequate birth control , possibility pregnancy study Has untreated major psychiatric comorbidity Has serious drugrelated behavioral issue Has neurological abnormality unrelated Failed Back Surgery Syndrome Diagnosed Raynaud disease Diagnosed Fibromyalgia Has active malignancy diagnose cancer remission least 1 year prior screening Has secondary gain , opinion investigator , likely interfere study Participating plan participate another clinical trial Has characteristics/limits household close contact involve study ( eg , family member already study participant blind could break )
